review: We are using it to view MLB, on our big screen tv, works great.

review: Not wrote it!  Get a ROKU. Maybe in the future Google will improve this product.

review: We bought a second Chromecast because we liked the first one so much!  They are easy to use and can be controlled from our phones, ipads, or computers!

review: Just bought both Chrocast and Roku.  I prefer Roku
